description.english: It's our first Halloween! Get in the mood with "The Skull" Halloween body paint item! Activate it on the main menu from Oct 28th - Nov 5th!

We will be giving a special item for betas that purchase the Steam Early Access before October Monday 21st, as ARENA GODS completes one week live! To claim the reward, the player must: 1.Have played the beta, 2.Purchase ARENA GODS Early Acces, 3.E-mail to build@supertype.com, with your Steam Profile Link until October 21st 11:59 PM PST.
